ApplicationFees: For domestic applicants, there is no application fee for first-year entry when using the Clarkson or Common App. The application fee for graduate programs is waived for both domestic and international applicants.
TestPolicy: Undergraduate: Clarkson continues to be test optional.
CoursesAndGrades: While Clarkson University's official website, www.clarkson.edu, does not specify a minimum GPA or a prescribed list of high school courses for admission, a holistic review of each applicant's academic background is conducted.
AdditionalDeadlines: After a thorough search of the Clarkson University website (www.clarkson.edu), no explicit deadlines for scholarships or financial aid, apart from general application timelines, could be located. While the website provides information on the types of aid available and the application process, specific dates for scholarship applications or financial aid submissions are not clearly listed in a consolidated format. Therefore, based on the available information on the official university website, a list of additional deadlines cannot be provided.
IsMultipleApplicationsAllowed: I have searched the official website of Clarkson University (www.clarkson.edu) and its associated pages to determine if a student can apply to multiple programs. My search included the undergraduate and graduate admissions sections, as well as frequently asked questions.

UGScholarshipHigh: The highest undergraduate scholarship at Clarkson University is the Ignite Presidential Fellowship, which covers all tuition costs.
